item.title: About
item.dc:creator: dbonlinepasal
item.content:encoded: This is an example of a page. Unlike posts, which are displayed on your blog‚Äôs front page in the order they‚Äôre published, pages are better suited for more timeless content that you want to be easily accessible, like your About or Contact information. Click the Edit link to make changes to this page or add another page.

item.title: Hello World!
item.dc:creator: dbonlinepasal
item.content:encoded:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8" />
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  <title>D&B Collection - Contact</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" />
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css" />
</head>
<body>
  <header>
    <div class="logo">D&B Collection</div>
    <div class="menu-toggle" aria-label="Toggle menu" role="button" tabindex="0">
      <span></span>
      <span></span>
      <span></span>
    </div>
    <nav>
      <a href="index.html">Home</a>
      <a href="shop.html">Shop</a>
      <a href="blog.html">Blog</a>
      <a href="contact.html" class="active">Contact</a>
    </nav>
    <button id="toggle-mode" class="button" style="margin-left: 15px;">‚òÄÔ∏è Light Mode</button>
  </header>

  <main class="container">
    <h1>Contact Us</h1>
    <p>Reach out to us anytime on WhatsApp or social media!</p>
    <div class="contact-info">
      <a href="https://wa.me/96565842143" target="_blank" aria-label="WhatsApp"><i class="fab fa-whatsapp"></i> WhatsApp</a>
      <a href="#" target="_blank" aria-label="Instagram"><i class="fab fa-instagram"></i> Instagram</a>
      <a href="#" target="_blank" aria-label="Facebook"><i class="fab fa-facebook"></i> Facebook</a>
    </div>
  </main>

  http://script.js
</body>
</html>

item.dc:creator: dbonlinepasal
item.content:encoded:
Discover a world of possibilities

Navigating life's intricate fabric, choices unfold paths to the extraordinary, demanding creativity, curiosity, and courage for a truly fulfilling journey.

Learn more

Posts

Welcome to a world of limitless possibilities, where the journey is as exhilarating as the destination, and where every moment is an opportunity to make your mark.

item.excerpt:encoded: Displays the latest posts as either the site homepage or as the "Posts page" as defined under reading settings. If it exists, the Front Page template overrides this template when posts are shown on the homepage.

item.dc:creator: dbonlinepasal
item.content:encoded:
D&B Collection

D&B Collection

Products About Contact

Affordable Style & Essentials Across Kuwait

Fashion, Beauty, Electronics & More | For Domestic Workers & Everyday Buyers

Order on WhatsApp

Our Products

Clothing

  • T-shirt ‚Äì KD 1.500
  • Saree ‚Äì KD 3.000

Cosmetics

  • Lipstick ‚Äì KD 1.000
  • Face Cream ‚Äì KD 2.000

Accessories

  • Handbag ‚Äì KD 2.500
  • Sunglasses ‚Äì KD 1.750

Mobile Accessories

  • Charger ‚Äì KD 1.000
  • Cover ‚Äì KD 0.750

About Us

EN: D&B Collection offers affordable clothing, cosmetics, and accessories. We deliver all over Kuwait, with focus on domestic workers and daily shoppers.

item.title: Hello And Namaste üôè!
item.dc:creator: dbonlinepasal
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to D&B Collection üí´

Welcome to D&B Collection ‚Äì your go-to place for clothing, accessories, cosmetics, electronics, and personal products in Kuwait. üõçÔ∏è
We offer fast home delivery anywhere in Kuwait, making shopping simple and convenient for you.

Follow us for the latest arrivals, special offers, and exclusive deals!
üì¶ Shop online through our social media pages or contact us directly on WhatsApp: +965 6584 2143.

Thank you for supporting D&B Collection ‚ù§Ô∏è

D&B_Collection!
